child.content: This app works best with JavaScript enabled.
Flutter: How to use the Stepper Widget
Make your large forms less cumbersome with the use of the Stepper widget.
Steppers convey progress through numbered steps.

How many times have you had to fill out a form and it feels like you've been scrolling forever? I've been in that spot more times than I can count. From the point of view of the developer, this isn't an easy task either. Forms are an eternal struggle, but a necessity for just about every mobile application.
To give this a whirl, let's establish the same starting project:

attributes.style: position: relative; display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;  max-width: 700px;

padding-bottom: 179.45205479452054%; position: relative; bottom: 0; left: 0; background-image: url('data:image/png;base64,'); background-size: cover; display: block;
position: relative; display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;  max-width: 700px;

padding-bottom: 179.45205479452054%; position: relative; bottom: 0; left: 0; background-image: url('data:image/png;base64,'); background-size: cover; display: block;

child.content: That gives us the following result(s) when we click our FAB:

attributes.style: position: relative; display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;  max-width: 700px;

padding-bottom: 56.25%; position: relative; bottom: 0; left: 0; background-image: url('data:image/png;base64,'); background-size: cover; display: block;
position: relative; display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;  max-width: 700px;

padding-bottom: 179.45205479452054%; position: relative; bottom: 0; left: 0; background-image: url('data:image/png;base64,'); background-size: cover; display: block;

child.content: I hope you found this useful! Now go out there and make some awesome steppers.

Paul Halliday is an author with a passion for cross platform mobile development. He's a recognised Ionic Community Leader and has created courses, books, and a vast amount of content based around the Ionic ecosystem.
